name: CBManagerState
desc: The possible states of a Core Bluetooth manager.

items.name: case poweredOff
items.desc: A state that indicates Bluetooth is currently powered off.

items.name: case poweredOn
items.desc: A state that indicates Bluetooth is currently powered on and available to use.

items.name: case resetting
items.desc: A state that indicates the connection with the system service was momentarily lost.

items.name: case unauthorized
items.desc: A state that indicates the application isn’t authorized to use the Bluetooth low energy role.

items.name: case unsupported
items.desc: A state that indicates this device doesn’t support the Bluetooth low energy central or client role.
